forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. Southwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
Under the gentle embrace of a night sky, Downtown San Francisco presents a tranquil yet vibrant scene. The air feels crisp, whispering hints of warmth as the temperature settles into the low fifties. The soft caress of a southwest wind, hardly more than a sigh, stirs the night lightly, reminding us of the delicate balance that plays between the city lights and the expansive bay. As dawn approaches, anticipation fills the air for a bright Wednesday ahead, one where the sun will grace the city with its reassuring glow and temperatures will flirt with the gentle highs of the sixties. 

As the day unfolds, it would be unfitting to dress solely in casual comfort. A light jacket or a cardigan will serve you well, especially as the morning coolness clings to the street corners. The day promises to be mostly clear with only the remnants of the marine layer retreating to the edges of the bay, allowing for splendid views and a radiant frame to the Golden Gate. This invites leisurely strolls along the Embarcadero, perhaps a visit to the nearby Ferry Building, where the pleasures of the palate can be indulged amidst the fresh local offerings. A perfect sip of coffee in hand while watching the day bloom will set the tone for a serene San Francisco Wednesday, where the charm of the city reawakens with every passing moment.
